pli-tv-pvr18:1.1: There is the offence one falls into unconscious (that it is against ordinance), rises from conscious (that it is against ordinance);
pli-tv-pvr18:1.2: there is the offence one falls into conscious … rises from unconscious …;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.3: there is the offence one falls into unconscious … rises from unconscious …;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.4: there is the offence one falls into conscious … rises from conscious (that it is against ordinance).
pli-tv-pvr18:1.5: There is the offence one of skilled mind falls into, one of skilled mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.6: there is the offence one of skilled mind falls into, one of unskilled mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.7: there is the offence one of skilled mind falls into, one of indeterminate mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.8: there is the offence one of unskilled mind falls into, one of skilled mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.9: there is the offence one of unskilled mind falls into, one of unskilled mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.10: there is the offence one of unskilled mind falls into, one of indeterminate mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.11: there is the offence one of indeterminate mind falls into, one of skilled mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.12: there is the offence one of indeterminate mind falls into, one of unskilled mind rises from;
pli-tv-pvr18:1.13: there is the offence one of indeterminate mind falls into, one of indeterminate mind rises from.
pli-tv-pvr18:2.1: From how many origins originates the first offence involving Defeat?
pli-tv-pvr18:2.2: The first offence involving Defeat originates from one origin:
pli-tv-pvr18:2.3: from body and mind, not from speech.
pli-tv-pvr18:3.1: From how many origins originates the second offence involving Defeat?
pli-tv-pvr18:3.3: it may be that it originates from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:3.4: it may be that it originates from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:3.5: it may be that it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:4.1: From how many origins originates the third offence involving Defeat?
pli-tv-pvr18:4.3: it may be that it originates from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:4.4: it may be that it originates from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:4.5: it may be that it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:5.1: From how many origins originates the fourth offence involving Defeat?
pli-tv-pvr18:5.3: it may be that it originates from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:5.4: it may be that it originates from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:5.5: it may be that it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:6.1: Concluded are the four Offences involving Defeat
pli-tv-pvr18:7.1: From how many origins originates the offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order for emitting impurity using (the hand)?
pli-tv-pvr18:7.3: from body and mind, not from speech.
pli-tv-pvr18:8.1: From how many … for coming into physical contact with a woman?
pli-tv-pvr18:8.3: from body and mind, not from speech.
pli-tv-pvr18:9.1: From how many … for offending a woman with lewd words?
pli-tv-pvr18:9.3: it may originate from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:9.4: it may originate from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:9.5: it may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:10.1: From how many … for speaking in praise of ministering to sense-pleasures for oneself in the presence of women?
pli-tv-pvr18:11.1: From how many … for acting as a go-between?
pli-tv-pvr18:11.3: it may originate from body, not from speech, not from mind;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.4: it may originate from speech, not from body, not from mind;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.5: it may originate from body and speech, not from mind;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.6: it may originate from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.7: it may originate from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.8: it may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:12.1: From how many … for begging for oneself for having a hut built?
pli-tv-pvr18:13.1: From how many … for having a large _vihāra_ built?
pli-tv-pvr18:14.1: From how many … for defaming a monk with an unfounded charge of an offence involving Defeat?
pli-tv-pvr18:15.1: From how many … for defaming a monk with a charge of an offence involving Defeat, taking up some point as a pretext in a legal question really belonging to something else?
pli-tv-pvr18:16.1: From how many … for a schismatic monk who on being admonished up to the third time does not give up (his course)?
pli-tv-pvr18:16.3: it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:17.1: From how many … for monks who are imitators of schismatics and on being admonished up to the third time do not give up (their course)?
pli-tv-pvr18:17.3: it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:18.1: From how many … for a monk who is difficult to speak to and on being admonished up to the third time does not give up (his course)?
pli-tv-pvr18:18.3: it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:19.1: From how many origins originates the offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order for a monk who brings a family into disrepute and on being admonished up to the third time does not give up (his course)?
pli-tv-pvr18:19.3: it originates from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:20.1: Concluded are the Thirteen Offences entailing a Formal Meeting of the Order
pli-tv-pvr18:21.2: From how many origins originates the offence of wrong-doing for relieving oneself or spitting in water, out of disrespect?
pli-tv-pvr18:21.3: The offence of wrong-doing for … out of disrespect originates from one origin:
pli-tv-pvr18:21.4: it originates from body and mind, not from speech.
pli-tv-pvr18:23.1: From how many origins originate the four offences involving Defeat?
pli-tv-pvr18:23.2: The four offences involving Defeat originate from three origins:
pli-tv-pvr18:23.3: they may originate from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:23.4: they may originate from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:23.5: they may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:24.1: From how many … the thirteen offences requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order?
pli-tv-pvr18:24.3: they may originate from body, not from speech, not from mind;
pli-tv-pvr18:24.8: may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:25.1: From how many … the two Undetermined offences?
pli-tv-pvr18:25.3: they may originate from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:25.4: they may originate from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:25.5: they may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:26.1: From how many … the thirty offences of Forfeiture?
pli-tv-pvr18:26.3: they may originate from body, not from speech, not from mind …
pli-tv-pvr18:26.8: they may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:27.1: From how many … the ninety-two offences of Expiation?
pli-tv-pvr18:27.3: they may originate from body, not from speech, not from mind …
pli-tv-pvr18:27.8: they may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:28.1: From how many … the four offences to be Confessed?
pli-tv-pvr18:28.3: they may originate from body, not from speech, not from mind;
pli-tv-pvr18:28.4: they may originate from body and speech, not from mind;
pli-tv-pvr18:28.5: they may originate from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:28.6: they may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:29.1: From how many origins originate the seventy-five _Sekhiyas_?
pli-tv-pvr18:29.2: The seventy-five _Sekhiyas_ originate from three origins:
pli-tv-pvr18:29.3: they may originate from body and mind, not from speech;
pli-tv-pvr18:29.4: they may originate from speech and mind, not from body;
pli-tv-pvr18:29.5: they may originate from body and speech and mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:32.3: Know well origin by the method
